name: Robe of the Archmage
description: A legendary robe worn only by the most powerful mages.
looks: The robe is made of shimmering blue silk with intricate golden embroidery. It has a hood that can be pulled up to conceal the wearer's face.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells by 20%.
special_effects.elemental_absorption: Absorbs a portion of elemental damage and converts it into mana.

name: Cursed Ring
description: A mysterious ring with a dark aura of power.
looks: The ring is made of blackened silver and has a large black gemstone in the center. It emanates a faint sinister glow.

special_effects.curse: Wearer loses health over time and is less effective in combat.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that has the power to heal and restore vitality.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It glows with a soft golden light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the user, restoring HP to nearby allies.

name: Leather Armor
description: Basic armor made of leather for basic protection.
looks: The leather armor consists of leather pieces stitched together. It is lightweight and flexible.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Adamantium Sword
description: A legendary sword made from the rare and powerful metal called adamantium.
looks: The sword has a gleaming silver blade that seems to radiate its own light. The hilt is adorned with intricate designs and a gemstone that glows with a faint blue hue.

special_effects.life_steal: Steals a portion of the damage dealt as health

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of shining gold with a large emerald embedded in the center. It has intricate engravings of muscles and symbols of power.

special_effects.strength_boost: Temporarily increases the wearer's strength for a short duration.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A cloak that grants the wearer enhanced stealth and the ability to blend into the shadows.
looks: The cloak is made of a dark, velvety material that seems to absorb light. It has a hood that can be pulled up to cover the wearer's face.

special_effects.invisibility: Allows the wearer to become invisible for a short period of time.
special_effects.shadow_step: Allows the wearer to teleport short distances through shadows.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large ruby gemstone.
looks: The ring is made of polished gold and features an intricately designed band. The centerpiece of the ring is a large ruby gemstone that shines with a deep red color.

name: Silver Bow
description: A sleek and powerful bow made of silver.
looks: The bow is crafted with great precision and has a shining silver finish. The limbs are slim and elegant, while the grip is wrapped in soft, black leather.
